attributes.title: RTX Crash Victim Memorial - RTP Extra
attributes.caption: In this special RTP Extra, Burnie is joined by Kevin DiCicco, one of the survivors of a fatal automobile accident involving a group of RT fans on the way to RTX. Kevin shares the stories of his friends Kyle, Dale and Holly in this touching memorial episod

attributes.description: The Rooster Teeth Podcast is back in video form! Join us for our episode originally aired on July 13, 2015, sponsored by Squarespace Onnit and Audible.This episode features Michael Jones, Barbara Dunkelman, Burnie Burns, and special guest Colton Dunn. Rooster Teeth Sponsors get to watch the episode streamed live during taping every Monday evening at 7:30PM Central Time.Sponsors for this week:SquarespaceOnnitAudibleCheck out our very own Barbara showcasing the best of Austin!
